name: COVID19LabTests
title: COVID19 Lab Tests
description:
Source https://loinc.org/prerelease/
https://www.cms.gov/newsroom/press-releases/cms-develops-additional-code-coronavirus-lab-tests
https://confluence.ihtsdotools.org/display/RMT/SNOMED+CT+March+2020+International+Edition+-+SNOMED+International+Release+notes

Given the variability in laboratory coding of tests, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the LOINC and HCPCS reference terms.  Source data may commonly contain codes from LabCorp (https://www.labcorp.com/coronavirusdiseasecovid19/providerinformation), Quest (https://www.questdiagnostics.com/home/Covid19/), and Bioreference (https://www.bioreference.com/coronavirus/).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of testing rates and testing results),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of LOINC, HCPCS, and SNOMED codes for lab tests of COVID19 virus and antibodies),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC, HCPCS, and SNOMED codes for COVID19 related lab tests, including prerelease and emergency codes (once available in VSAC), reference laboratory, point of care, and homebased tests),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
